Package com.barrysheehan.www

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Interactable
    Defines methods to be used when any form of user input needs to be captured and processed.
    TextSwapper
    Defines methods used to swap words from a body of text with any words of the programmer's choosing.
    WordMap
    Defines methods used to create a Map of words wordMap and a Set of related words dictionary which the words in the map can reference.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractThesaurus
    Implements WordMap to create a thesaurus in which words in the dictionary Set provide possible values for any words added as keys to the wordMap map.
    ConfigurationInteractable
    Prompts the user for input and uses that input to configure the supplied TextSimplifier object.
    FileReader
    Class contains static methods for parsing .txt files and for verifying whether a file at a given path exists.
    Runner
    Runs the Text Simplifier application by creating and running the necessary objects.
    TextSimplifier
    Simplifies a String passed to it and returns a simplified version of the String.
    TextSimplifierInteractable
    Prompts the user for input and uses a TextSimplifier object to simplify user input.
    Thesaurus
    Extends AbstractThesaurus and provides methods to build a "thesaurus" wordMap from two .txt files.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConsoleColour
    Stores all possible values for text colours used in the program as ANSI escape codes.
